actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Fair Packaging and Labeling Act to require aerosol commodities to disclose certain information with respect to the propellants contained in such commodities.

summary.text: Aerosol Ingredient Disclosure Act - Requires, under the Fair Packaging and Labeling Act, the labels of, and advertisements for, any aerosol consumer commodity to disclose the weight of propellant used in such commodity and its portion of the net quantity of contents of the commodity. Requires the label on such commodity to state the propellant's generic name, popular name, and type.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Fair Packaging and Labeling Act to require aerosol commodities to disclose certain information with respect to the propellants contained in such commodities.
